description.narrative: ROMP Output 1.7: (Social Inclusion) Improved regional social policy environment for reaching excluded children and women with priority sectoral and social protection interventions,which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Public Finance And Local Governance, Social Exclusion â€“ Data And Evidence, Social Protection, Social Protection And Child Poverty, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: ESA country programmes contribute to achieving the MTSP key results for children through application of country appropriate strategies - in humanitarian and development contexts.

sector.narrative: Cash Transfers: Technical support to government cash transfer system development and expansion (design, targeting, beneficiary selection, grievance mechanism, cash delivery mechanisms like banking, mobiles, community distribution)
Child marriage - surveys (e.g. KAP, VACS), data analysis/research/evaluation evidence generation, synthesis, and use
Child poverty analysis towards policy change (Profiling, mapping and identifying drivers of multi-dimensional and monetary poverty of children, modelling and simulation of policy options)

Contributing to policies reducing child poverty: Poverty reduction strategies, national development plans, engagement with ministries, parliament, international donor and financial organizations, civil society organizations)
HQ and RO technical support to multiple Goal Areas
PF4C - domestic revenue mobilization and access to finance for key social services
Social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

description.narrative: Development Partner affairs Technical staff services
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities social services (incl youth development and women+ children)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: ROMP Output 1.7: (Social Inclusion) Improved regional social policy environment for reaching excluded children and women with priority sectoral and social protection interventions

description.narrative: The section influenced regional and country level policy discussions by generating and disseminating knowledge on the impact of social protection programmes and national budget processes on children. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:09/12/2017
